definition: bedding made of two layers of cloth filled with stuffing and stitched together, to stitch or sew together
details:
noun
- bedding made of two layers of cloth filled with stuffing and stitched together
= example: bedding made of two layers of cloth filled with stuffing and stitched together
= synonyms: comfort
verb
- to stitch or sew together
= example: to stitch or sew together
